extension.summary: [COLOR mediumblue]BoongoTV[/COLOR] [COLOR red]Wizard[/COLOR]
extension.description: [COLOR gold]The Future Of Home Entertainment[/COLOR][CR]Kodi Repository for [COLOR steelblue]BoongoTV[/COLOR][CR][COLOR gold][B]ElectricalForce[/B][/COLOR] [COLOR white]Repo[/COLOR] allows you to install the BoongoTV WIZARD where you can get access to the latest BoongoTV Custom Builds and more.
extension.license: GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 3, 29 June 2007
extension.disclaimer: The author of this addon do not host any of the content which is found and have no affiliation with any of the content providers. This addon simply searches websites for content. Use at your own risk!

extension.summary: The Theme Wizard is for installing Themes Only on Kodi 19 Matrix.
extension.description: Kodi 19 Wizard
extension.disclaimer: This Addon contains no content
extension.news: 1.0.6 - Added Notifications Dialog. Special thanks to Blue for art and helping with the design. 1.0.5 - Bugfixes. 1.0.3 - Added download progress to build install. 1.0.2 - Added option to encode the buildfile variable to a base64 string. 1.0.1 - Added the option to use json for build file. 1.0.0 - Basic clean up. Ready for official release. 0.0.9 - Added Save Menu, 0.0.8 - Bug fixes, 0.0.7 - Added Advanced Settings presets to Maintenance. 0.0.6 - Added Clear Packages, the first of the Maintenance section. 0.0.5 - Bug fixes 0.0.4 - Added enabling of disabled addons on build first run. Added update repos on build first run. 0.0.3 - Added prompt notifying when new version of installed build is available. 0.0.2 - Initial Release

extension.summary: Python 2 and 3 compatibility utilities.
extension.description: Six is a Python 2 and 3 compatibility library. It provides utility functions for smoothing over the differences between the Python versions with the goal of writing Python code that is compatible on both Python versions. See the documentation for more information on what is provided.

extension.summary: Wrappers around Kodi Python API for seamless Python 2/3 compatibility
extension.description: Wrappers around Kodi Python API that normalize handling of textual and byte strings in Python 2 and 3.

extension.summary: PVR Client um Kodi mit BoongoTV Middleware zu verbinden
PVR Client to connect Kodi to BoongoTV Middleware
Cliente PVR para conectar Kodi al Middleware BoongoTV
Client enregistreur vidéo (PVR) pour connecter Kodi à l'intergiciel BoongoTV
PVR klijent za povezivanje Kodija na BoongoTV Middleware
Client PVR per connettere Kodi a BoongoTV Middleware
Cliente PVR para ligar o Kodi ao BoongoTV Middleware
Клиент PVR для подключения BoongoTV Middleware к Kodi
